content:
Jeevaddhvaniyaal kartthaavaa
Hvaanam cheythu-lovaasaare! Nee
/tvannaa-lum sheeghram velliyil
/tmrthanu-ththhaanam cheythu mudaa
Povathu kandaa yoodanmaar
Jeevapradane-geethatthaal vaazhtthi.

Nyaan besaniyaa-puriyilkkoo-di poyu
Yeshuvino-diru soda-rimaar
Vaavittevam-kezhunna-thu kettu:
/tnaathhaa! Nyangall-than bhraathaa-vum ni-
/tnnishdanumaa-mee lo-vaasaar
/tnin saanniddhyaa-bhaavaal mr-thanaayi,
Vaangippoyor-kkuyiruththhaa-nangall
Paathaalla-tthil gho-shippaan
Ee lovaasaar-ninnaal pre-shithanaayu
/tlovaasaare-kabarilni-nnetti
/tsodarimaar-kku samarppichon
/thaaleluyyaa-mashihaa u-thkrshdan.
